message.raw:
Bolted on a crude preview mode. A matplotlib window is automatically opened.
Then the server listens at the terminal window for 'p' or 's' keyboard presses.
'p' starts slow acquisitions, updating the preview window.
's' stops those acquistions.

Also modified the Trigger setup so camera can be easily switched between
software triggers for previewing and hardware triggers for shots.
